divs: Sighting Detailsthey arived around 6:30 PM it was cold rainy outside i knew they had come beacuse they told me telephaticly.they told me to go outside and i did we observed eachother for a few seconds then i got bored and went inside.onother time it moved for 3-4 seconds then turn to light speed i'm sending this because i'm curious to know what i am. He told me they are always aroud me and i always hear the same one teaching me things,emotionaly,human histoy,technology,how to fly them but i trully dont undurstand i looked up ufo abduction cases and the abductees described the ship's interiors the way my father,He what ever it is, it told mehow the ships looked like or built inside but nothing too drastic please email me-and thats all you'll and if try to contact my email has the wrong info so they can't find me please do email me i'm not playing a joke on you.
